## TemplateVarsExtendFunction type

Function used to create a new collection of [TemplateVars](./ts-json.templatevars.md) with one or more new or changed values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TemplateVarsExtendFunction = (base: TemplateVars | undefined, values: VariableValue[]) => Result<TemplateVars | undefined>;
```
